last_episode_to_air.name: Fools for Love
last_episode_to_air.overview: Callie's psychotic, prankster ex-boyfriend escapes from an asylum and wreaks havoc on Mark's life.

name: Ugly Americans
overview: Social worker Mark Lilly helps new citizens—both human and "other"—begin the process of adapting to life in the Big Apple, but his coworkers, demonic bureaucrat Twayne, drunken wizard Leonard Powers, surly law enforcement head Frank Grimes & his girlfriend, Callie, don't make it easy.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: A New York Department of Integration social worker helps supernatural creatures adapt to city life.

episodes.name: An American Werewolf in America
episodes.overview: Mark cares for an undocumented werewolf, and Leonard envies his famous magician brother, Christ Angel.

episodes.name: Demon Baby
episodes.overview: Callie goes baby-crazy when Mark fosters a demon orphan, and Twayne notices odd changes in his body.

episodes.name: Blob Gets a Job
episodes.overview: Mark accidentally outs Randall as a zombie, and Leonard tries to identify a strange new creature.

episodes.name: Treegasm
episodes.overview: Mark helps an old tree get its groove back, and Randall loses his favorite non-vital organ.

episodes.name: So, You Want to be a Vampire
episodes.overview: Mark walks a young couple through the trials of vampire love, and "Larry King disease" ravages New York City.

episodes.name: Kong of Queens
episodes.overview: An obsessive-compulsive giant ape needs a job, and Callie struggles with her sudden attraction to Twayne.

episodes.name: Better Off Undead
episodes.overview: Randall joins a zombie cult, and Mark performs psychiatric evaluations on his coworkers.

episodes.name: Kill, Mark, Kill!
episodes.overview: Mark helps Leonard with his magic wand issues, and Twayne Boneraper meets his two-dimensional soulmate.

episodes.name: Sympathy for the Devil
episodes.overview: Councilman Fitzpatrick sells his soul to Twayne, and Callie considers a cushy job in Hell.

episodes.name: Hell for the Holidays
episodes.overview: Mark and Randall spend Halloween with Callie's family, and Leonard tries to find people to live in a haunted house.

episodes.name: Trolling for Terror
episodes.overview: Randall shambles his way onto an all-creature reality show, and a troll wrestles with riddle addiction.

episodes.name: Soulsucker
episodes.overview: Mark and Randall teach a sexed up robot self-control, and Callie mixes up Mark in a demonic ritual.

episodes.name: The Man Birds
episodes.overview: Manbird season hits New York City, and Mark finds himself the guardian of a fledgling separated from its flock.

episodes.name: Wet Hot Demonic Summer
episodes.overview: Twayne and Callie build a summer camp to cover up their raid on a wizard training ground.

episodes.name: Callie and Her Sister
episodes.overview: Callie must care for her younger, hotter demon sister, who happens to be engaged to Twayne.

episodes.name: Ride Me to Hell
episodes.overview: When his favorite TV series ends with a dumb twist, Grimes has a complete mental breakdown.

episodes.name: G. I. Twayne
episodes.overview: After being drafted into Satan's dark army, Twayne and Mark must do their patriotic duty and end the world.

episodes.name: The Ring of Powers
episodes.overview: Mark accidentally reactivates Leonard's magical arranged marriage.

episodes.name: Attack of Mark's Clone
episodes.overview: Callie makes an evil Mark clone to compete in the DOI bowling league tournament.

episodes.name: Wail Street
episodes.overview: Randall tries to make a quick buck on the Soul Exchange by selling off Mark's immortal soul.

episodes.name: Little Ship of Horrors
episodes.overview: Randall is infected by horrifying plants at sea when Twayne throws a cruise ship party.

episodes.name: Lilly and the Beast
episodes.overview: Mark hooks up with an old girlfriend to test his open relationship.

episodes.name: Mummy Dearest
episodes.overview: Grimes' judgmental mother rises from the dead, and a neglected Randall reconsiders his living situation.

episodes.name: Journey to the Center of Twayne
episodes.overview: A Lilliputian arsonist escapes Mark's custody and finds an unlikely hiding place in Twayne's nose.

episodes.name: Any Given Workday
episodes.overview: Randall's new arm lands him on the DOI's intramural football team, and Callie pimps out Leonard.

episodes.name: The Roast of Twayne the Boneraper
episodes.overview: Twayne quits after getting roasted at his DOI 10-year anniversary party, leaving Mark in charge.

episodes.name: Mark Loves Dick
episodes.overview: Callie is promptly promoted after turning into a man, causing strife in her relationship with Mark.

episodes.name: The Stalking Dead
episodes.overview: Lady Hoo-Ha, America's most adored pop star, goes zombie, and her many devoted fans follow suit.

episodes.name: The Dork Knight
episodes.overview: A rabid Bat Boy takes a bite out of Mark, transforming him into New York City's latest superhero.

episodes.name: Fools for Love
episodes.overview: Callie's psychotic, prankster ex-boyfriend escapes from an asylum and wreaks havoc on Mark's life.
